title: Hack4Change Privacy Policy
intro: Hack4Change, organized by Civic Tech Moncton, is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
sections.content: When you register for Hack4Change, we collect:
items: Name and contact information (email, phone number)
Professional information (skills, experience, LinkedIn profile - optional)
Team formation preferences
Dietary restrictions and accessibility requirements
Demographic information for reporting purposes (optional)
sections.additional: During the event, we may collect:
additionalItems: Photos and videos for promotional purposes

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: Process your registration and communicate event details
Facilitate team formation and mentor matching
Provide meals and accommodations tailored to your needs
Share your contact information with sponsors (with your explicit consent only)
Improve future events through feedback analysis
Promote Hack4Change and Civic Tech Moncton through photos/videos (with consent)

categories.title: With Your Consent:
items: Contact information and resumes shared with sponsors only if you opt in during registration
Photos/videos used for promotional purposes only if you provide consent

categories.title: Required Disclosures:
items: We may disclose information if required by law or to protect safety

categories.title: We Never:
items: Sell your personal information to third parties
Share your information with sponsors without your explicit consent
Use your information for purposes unrelated to the event

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request correction of inaccurate information
Withdraw consent for information sharing with sponsors at any time
Opt out of promotional emails (while still receiving essential event communications)
Request deletion of your information after the event concludes

sections.title: 6. Data Retention
items: Registration information is retained for the duration of the event and 90 days after for follow-up
Photos/videos with your consent may be retained indefinitely for promotional purposes
Anonymized data may be retained for event reporting and improvement

sections.title: 7. Cookies and Website Analytics
sections.content: Our website may use cookies and analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) to improve user experience and understand website traffic. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

sections.title: 8. Children's Privacy
sections.content: Participants under 18 must provide parental/guardian consent. We do not knowingly collect information from minors without parental consent.

sections.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date.

contactInfo.title: Contact Us
contactInfo.content: Questions about this privacy policy or your personal information?
